creator: Terry.Rosenbaum@gmail.com
text:
Current unit tests are insufficient to elucidate some known problems.

Additions/enhancments supplied as attached files and patches:

1) add file org.apache.xindice.integration.client.services.IndexedSearchTest in
tests
    - Various tests of indexed searching. Ensures indexes are used
      and indexed searching functionality is correct.
2) patch file for org.apache.xindice.integration.client.services.XPathQueryTest
    - Test for deep importation of namespace definitions
    - exercise evalMathOperation in XPathQueryResolver with a non-number operand

3) patch file for org.apache.xindice.integration.IntegrationTests
    - Adds IndexedSearchTest as one of the tests run

creator: kevinoneill@apache.org
text: Added to my local tree, lots of nice new test failures.

creator: kevinoneill@apache.org
text:
Applied patches. There was some difficulty doing this (alot had to be done
manually) as the patches where not supplied in diff -u format from the root of
the project.
